record1.<1>:
$insert rdklocatetype_equates

EQU TRUE$		TO 1
EQU FALSE$		TO 0
EQU NULL$		TO ""

Declare Function RDKLocateType, RDKGetClassFromHierarchy, RDKGetTypeFromHierarchy
Declare Subroutine End_Dialog

/* Determine type, class (if...) and entity name as appropriate to level
	return level and selection */

SelItem = .Working_List->SelPos_Ex

EveryThing = .Working_List->List_Ex

retVal = ""

If SelItem<3> = 0 then
	Begin Case
		Case SelItem<2> = 1
			reposType = EveryThing<SelItem<1>>
			TypeLoc = RDKLocateType(.List_Types->List, reposType, RDKTYPEBYDESC$)
			If TypeLoc then	
				retVal = "~*" : .List_Types->List<TypeLoc, 1>
			end

		Case SelItem<2> = 2
			reposType = RDKGetTypeFromHierarchy(EveryThing, SelItem<1>, .List_Types->List)
			If Len(reposType) then
				retVal = "~*" : reposType : "*" : EveryThing<SelItem<1>>[5, 99]
			end

		Case SelItem<2> = 3
			reposType = RDKGetTypeFromHierarchy(EveryThing, SelItem<1>, .List_Types->List)
			If Len(reposType) then
				reposClass = RDKGetClassFromHierarchy(EveryThing, SelItem<1>)
				retVal = "~*" : reposType : "*" : reposClass : "*" : EveryThing<SelItem<1>>[5, 99]
			end
		
	end Case
end
	
End_Dialog("RDKV_SELUSING", retVal)

return FALSE$
